label: [NodeDev] Example of Json Schema Holistic Validator
info:
::: aim

Proivde examples of using the [JSON Schema Holistic Validator](https://flowhub.org/f/a7a81bcd7159a826)

:::

name: Validate payload property
info:
## Person Type

`object` ([Person](definition.md))

# Person Properties

| Property                | Type      | Required | Nullable       | Defined by                                                                     |
| :---------------------- | :-------- | :------- | :------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [firstName](#firstname) | `string`  | Optional | cannot be null | [Person](definition-properties-firstname.md "undefined#/properties/firstName") |
| [lastName](#lastname)   | `string`  | Required | cannot be null | [Person](definition-properties-lastname.md "undefined#/properties/lastName")   |
| [age](#age)             | `integer` | Optional | cannot be null | [Person](definition-properties-age.md "undefined#/properties/age")             |

## firstName

The person's first name.

`firstName`

*   is optional

*   Type: `string`

*   cannot be null

*   defined in: [Person](definition-properties-firstname.md "undefined#/properties/firstName")

### firstName Type

`string`

## lastName

The person's last name.

`lastName`

*   is required

*   Type: `string`

*   cannot be null

*   defined in: [Person](definition-properties-lastname.md "undefined#/properties/lastName")

### lastName Type

`string`

## age

Age in years which must be equal to or greater than zero.

`age`

*   is optional

*   Type: `integer`

*   cannot be null

*   defined in: [Person](definition-properties-age.md "undefined#/properties/age")

### age Type

`integer`

### age Constraints

**minimum**: the value of this number must greater than or equal to: `0`

---
## firstName Type

`string`

---
## lastName Type

`string`

---
## age Type

`integer`

## age Constraints

**minimum**: the value of this number must greater than or equal to: `0`
